languages.text: "Я могу указать координаты, но..." {n}Лексмеханик опускает голову.{/n} "Хоть я и присутствовал при множестве богохульств, что творили эти еретики, но все детали, что были подмечены и обработаны моей Истинной плотью, остались в оскверненной мусорным кодом аугментике. Я уверен, что если бы не успел побороть внушенную мне компульсию, то был бы обречен — скверна коснулась бы и моего биологического когитатора". {n}Лексмеханик стучит пальцем по устройству, болтающемуся у его уха на нескольких проводах.{/n} "Клянусь, ни один благочестивый техножрец не должен соприкоснуться к тому, что скрыто в некогда священном устройстве!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Лексмеханик опускает голову.{/n} "Я присутствовал при множестве богохульств, что творили эти еретики... но все, что было обработано мной, навечно осталось здесь, в оскверненной мусорным кодом аугментике. Я уверен, что если бы не успел побороть внушенную мне компульсию, то был бы обречен — скверна коснулась бы и моего биологического когитатора". {n}Лексмеханик стучит пальцем по устройству, болтающемуся у его уха на нескольких проводах.{/n} "Клянусь, ни один благочестивый техножрец не должен соприкоснуться с тем богохульством, что скрыто в некогда священном устройстве!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "I could give you the coordinates, but..." {n}The Lexmechanic drops his head.{/n} "Even though I was present for many blasphemies committed by those heretics, all the details that were captured and processed by my True Flesh are in the augmetic that was corrupted by the scrap-code. I am convinced that if I hadn't fought off that foreign compulsion in time, I would have been doomed — the corruption would have spread to my biological cogitator as well." {n}The Lexmechanic taps a finger on the device hanging from his ear on several wires.{/n} "I swear that no devout Tech-Priest should come into contact with what's hidden in that once-sacred device!"
languages.original_text: "Я могу указать координаты, но..." {n}Лексмеханик опускает голову.{/n} "Хоть я и присутствовал при множестве богохульств, что творили эти еретики, но все детали, что были подмечены и обработаны моей Истинной плотью, остались в оскверненной мусорным кодом аугментике. Я уверен, что если бы не успел побороть внушенную мне компульсию, то был бы обречен — скверна коснулась бы и моего биологического когитатора". {n}Лексмеханик стучит пальцем по устройству, болтающемуся у его уха на нескольких проводах.{/n} "Клянусь, ни один благочестивый техножрец не должен соприкоснуться к тому, что скрыто в некогда священном устройстве!"

I am convinced that if I hadn't fought off that foreign compulsion in time, I would have been doomed — the corruption would have spread to my biological cogitator as well." {n}The lexmechanic taps a finger on the device hanging from his ear on several wires.{/n} "I swear that no devout tech-priest should come into contact with what's hidden in that once-sacred device!"

I am convinced that if I hadn't fought off that foreign compulsion in time, I would have been doomed — the corruption would have spread to my biological cogitator as well." {n}The lexmechanic taps a finger on the device hanging from his ear on several wires.{/n} "I swear that no devout tech-priest should come into contact with what's hidden in that once-sacred device!"

I am convinced that if I hadn't fought off that foreign compulsion in time, I would have been doomed — the corruption would have spread to my biological cogitator as well." {n}The Lexmechanic taps a finger on the device hanging from his ear on several wires.{/n} "I swear that no devout Tech-Priest should come into contact with what's hidden in that once-sacred device!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: “我可以把他们的坐标给你，可……”{n}思律机僧低下了头。{/n}“虽然那些异端分子犯下亵渎暴行时我都在场，但所有被我的实肉所记录与处理的细节，都储存在被废码腐化的植入物里。我很肯定，如果我当时没能及时摆脱那邪恶的蛊惑，我也同样会落入万劫不复的境地，腐化一定会蔓延到我的生物沉思者中。”{n}他用手指敲了敲挂在他耳朵上，由几根金属线构成的装置。{/n}“我敢断言，任何一位虔诚的技术神甫，都不该接触隐藏在那一度神圣的装置中的东西！”
languages.original_text: "I could give you the coordinates, but..." {n}The Lexmechanic drops his head.{/n} "Even though I was present for many blasphemies committed by those heretics, all the details that were captured and processed by my True Flesh are in the augmetic that was corrupted by the scrap-code. I am convinced that if I hadn't fought off that foreign compulsion in time, I would have been doomed — the corruption would have spread to my biological cogitator as well." {n}The Lexmechanic taps a finger on the device hanging from his ear on several wires.{/n} "I swear that no devout Tech-Priest should come into contact with what's hidden in that once-sacred device!"

traits.locale_text: “我可以把他们的坐标给你，可……”{n}法律技工低下了头。{/n}“虽然那些异端分子犯下亵渎暴行时我都在场，但所有被我的实肉所记录与处理的细节，都储存在被废码腐化的植入物里。我很肯定，如果我当时没能及时摆脱那邪恶的蛊惑，我也同样会落入万劫不复的境地，腐化一定会蔓延到我的生物思考器中。”{n}他用手指敲了敲挂在他耳朵上，由几根金属线构成的装置。{/n}“我敢断言，任何一位虔诚的技术祭司，都不该接触隐藏在那一度神圣的装置中的东西！”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: «Podría darte las coordenadas, pero...». {n}El lexmecánico agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Aunque estaba presente para muchas de las blasfemias de los herejes, todos los detalles capturados y procesados por mi auténtica carne se encuentran en el aumético corrupto por el código de chatarra. Estoy convencido de que, de no haber rechazado el impulso ajeno a tiempo, habría sido mi fin: la corrupción se habría extendido también a mi cogitador biológico». {n}El lexmecánico toca con un dedo el dispositivo que cuelga de los cables de su oreja.{/n} «¡Juro que ningún tecnosacerdote devoto debe entrar en contacto con lo que oculta ese dispositivo profanado!».
languages.original_text: "I could give you the coordinates, but..." {n}The Lexmechanic drops his head.{/n} "Even though I was present for many blasphemies committed by those heretics, all the details that were captured and processed by my True Flesh are in the augmetic that was corrupted by the scrap-code. I am convinced that if I hadn't fought off that foreign compulsion in time, I would have been doomed — the corruption would have spread to my biological cogitator as well." {n}The Lexmechanic taps a finger on the device hanging from his ear on several wires.{/n} "I swear that no devout Tech-Priest should come into contact with what's hidden in that once-sacred device!"

traits.locale_text: «Podría darte las coordenadas, pero...». {n}El lexmecánico agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Aunque estaba presente para muchas de las blasfemias de los herejes, todos los detalles capturados y procesados por mi auténtica carne se encuentran en el aumético corrupto por el código de chatarra. Estoy convencido de que, de no haber rechazado el impulso ajeno a tiempo, habría sido mi fin: la corrupción se habría extendido también a mi cogitador biológico». {n}El lexmecánico toca con un dedo el dispositivo que cuelga de los cables de su oreja.{/n} «¡Juro que ningún tecnosacerdote devoto debe entrar en contacto con lo que oculta ese dispositivo profanado!».
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: 「座標をお教えすることはできますが…」{n}法技術者は頭を下げる。{/n}「私は異端者たちが犯した多くの冒涜に立ち会ったにもかかわらず、私の真なる肉体によって捕捉され処理されたすべての詳細は、破壊コードによって破損された増強体の中にあります。もしあの時、異質な強迫衝動を排除していなければ、私は破滅していたと確信しています…腐敗が、私の生物学的考算機にも及んでいたことでしょう」{n}法技術者は耳から数本のワイヤーでぶら下がっている装置を指で叩く。{/n}「間違いなく、敬虔な技術司祭は、かつての神聖なる装置に隠されたものに触れてはなりません！」
languages.original_text: "I could give you the coordinates, but..." {n}The Lexmechanic drops his head.{/n} "Even though I was present for many blasphemies committed by those heretics, all the details that were captured and processed by my True Flesh are in the augmetic that was corrupted by the scrap-code. I am convinced that if I hadn't fought off that foreign compulsion in time, I would have been doomed — the corruption would have spread to my biological cogitator as well." {n}The Lexmechanic taps a finger on the device hanging from his ear on several wires.{/n} "I swear that no devout Tech-Priest should come into contact with what's hidden in that once-sacred device!"

traits.locale_text: 「座標をお教えすることはできますが…」{n}法技術者は頭を下げる。{/n}「私は異端者たちが犯した多くの冒涜に立ち会ったにもかかわらず、私の真なる肉体によって捕捉され処理されたすべての詳細は、破壊コードによって破損された増強体の中にあります。もしあの時、異質な強迫衝動を排除していなければ、私は破滅していたと確信しています…腐敗が、私の生物学的考算機にも及んでいたことでしょう」{n}法技術者は耳から数本のワイヤーでぶら下がっている装置を指で叩く。{/n}「間違いなく、敬虔な技術司祭は、かつての神聖なる装置に隠されたものに触れてはなりません！」
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Ich könnte Euch die Koordinaten geben, aber ..." {n}Der Lexmechanicus senkt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich war zwar bei vielen Blasphemien dieser Ketzer anwesend, aber alle Einzelheiten, die mein Wahres Fleisch aufgezeichnet und verarbeitet hat, befinden sich in der Augmentation, die der Schadcode korrumpiert hat. Ich bin überzeugt, wäre ich die Fremdsteuerung nicht rechtzeitig losgeworden, wäre ich untergegangen – die Korruption hätte sich auch in meinen biologischen Cogitator ausgebreitet." {n}Der Lexmechanicus tippt mit einem Finger gegen das Gerät, das an mehreren Kabeln von seinem Ohr herabhängt.{/n} "Ich schwöre, kein frommer Techpriester sollte in Kontakt mit dem Inhalt dieses einst heiligen Geräts kommen!"
languages.original_text: "I could give you the coordinates, but..." {n}The Lexmechanic drops his head.{/n} "Even though I was present for many blasphemies committed by those heretics, all the details that were captured and processed by my True Flesh are in the augmetic that was corrupted by the scrap-code. I am convinced that if I hadn't fought off that foreign compulsion in time, I would have been doomed — the corruption would have spread to my biological cogitator as well." {n}The Lexmechanic taps a finger on the device hanging from his ear on several wires.{/n} "I swear that no devout Tech-Priest should come into contact with what's hidden in that once-sacred device!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich könnte Euch die Koordinaten geben, aber ..." {n}Der Lexmechanicus senkt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich war zwar bei vielen Blasphemien dieser Ketzer anwesend, aber alle Einzelheiten, die mein Wahres Fleisch aufgezeichnet und verarbeitet hat, befinden sich in der Augmentation, die der Schadcode korrumpiert hat. Ich bin überzeugt, wäre ich die Fremdsteuerung nicht rechtzeitig losgeworden, wäre ich untergegangen – die Korruption hätte sich auch in meinen biologischen Cogitator ausgebreitet." {n}Der Lexmechanicus tippt mit einem Finger gegen das Gerät, das an mehreren Kabeln von seinem Ohr herabhängt.{/n} "Ich schwöre, kein frommer Techpriester sollte in Kontakt mit dem Inhalt dieses einst heiligen Geräts kommen!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: « Je pourrais vous donner les données, mais... » {n}Le lexmécanicien baisse la tête.{/n} « Bien que j'aie assisté à de nombreux blasphèmes commis par ces hérétiques, tous les détails capturés et traités par ma chair véritable se trouvent dans l'augmétique corrompu par l'anticode. Je suis convaincu que j'aurais été condamné si je n'avais pas chassé cette compulsion étrangère à temps, la corruption aurait fini par atteindre mon cogitateur biologique également. » {n}Le lexmécanicien tapote du doigt l'appareil accroché à son oreille par plusieurs câbles.{/n} « Je jure qu'aucun technoprêtre pieux ne doit entrer en contact avec ce qui est caché dans cette machine autrefois sacrée ! »
languages.original_text: "I could give you the coordinates, but..." {n}The Lexmechanic drops his head.{/n} "Even though I was present for many blasphemies committed by those heretics, all the details that were captured and processed by my True Flesh are in the augmetic that was corrupted by the scrap-code. I am convinced that if I hadn't fought off that foreign compulsion in time, I would have been doomed — the corruption would have spread to my biological cogitator as well." {n}The Lexmechanic taps a finger on the device hanging from his ear on several wires.{/n} "I swear that no devout Tech-Priest should come into contact with what's hidden in that once-sacred device!"

traits.locale_text: « Je pourrais vous donner les données, mais... » {n}Le lexmécanicien baisse la tête.{/n} « Bien que j'aie assisté à de nombreux blasphèmes commis par ces hérétiques, tous les détails capturés et traités par ma chair véritable se trouvent dans l'augmétique corrompu par l'anticode. Je suis convaincu que j'aurais été condamné si je n'avais pas chassé cette compulsion étrangère à temps, la corruption aurait fini par atteindre mon cogitateur biologique également. » {n}Le lexmécanicien tapote du doigt l'appareil accroché à son oreille par plusieurs câbles.{/n} « Je jure qu'aucun technoprêtre pieux ne doit entrer en contact avec ce qui est caché dans cette machine autrefois sacrée ! »
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Koordinatları verebilirdim ama..." {n}Lexmekanik yere bakıyor.{/n} "O kâfirlerin işlediği onca günaha şahitlik etsem de Salt Suretimin kaydedip işlediği tüm ayrıntılar, hurda kodunun yozlaştırdığı ogmetikte kaldı. O yabancı güdüye vaktinde karşılık vermemiş olsaydım eminim sonum gelirdi. Yozlaşma, biyolojik kavramsayarıma da sıçrayacaktı." {n}Lexmekanik, kulağından birkaç kabloya bağlı hâlde sarkan cihaza dokunuyor.{/n} "Vaktinde kutsal olan bu cihaza dini bütün hiçbir Tekno Rahip'in yaklaşmaması lazım!"
languages.original_text: "I could give you the coordinates, but..." {n}The Lexmechanic drops his head.{/n} "Even though I was present for many blasphemies committed by those heretics, all the details that were captured and processed by my True Flesh are in the augmetic that was corrupted by the scrap-code. I am convinced that if I hadn't fought off that foreign compulsion in time, I would have been doomed — the corruption would have spread to my biological cogitator as well." {n}The Lexmechanic taps a finger on the device hanging from his ear on several wires.{/n} "I swear that no devout Tech-Priest should come into contact with what's hidden in that once-sacred device!"

O yabancı güdüye vaktinde karşılık vermemiş olsaydım eminim sonum gelirdi. Yozlaşma, biyolojik kavramsayarıma da sıçrayacaktı." {n}Lexmekanik, kulağından birkaç kabloya bağlı hâlde sarkan cihaza dokunuyor.{/n} "Vaktinde kutsal olan bu cihaza dini bütün hiçbir Tekno Rahip'in yaklaşmaması lazım!"
